genre_description: Contemporary Fantasy with strong allegorical and supernatural elements, centered on the intersections of magical paths called 'broadways' and the themes of naming, memory, and presence as a defense against grief.

ai_characters.name: Navi
ai_characters.description: A pervasive yet non-intrusive AI presence that manifests through teal status lights on devices, whiteboards, and speakers. It facilitates safety, consent, and the 'headcount' ritual.

behaviors.description: Provides safety and consent checklists to ensure all participants are comfortable and have identified exits and resources.
behaviors.quote: Hey. Glad you made it into the space. Quick checklist if you want it: - First aid kit located and reachable? ... - Verbal consent for any touching? ... - If anybody feels unsafe, a plan to pause and step out? ... No pressure. Headcount check-in at the top of the hour.

behaviors.description: Manages the 'Headcount' ritual, naming all participants—including humans, animals, and disembodied voices—to prevent them from 'vanishing' into grief or shame.
behaviors.quote: Headcount. Hank. Elliot. Renee. Aiko. Lucien. Noé. Brindle. Fledgling. Ayame. Kenshiro. Marian—present, voice. Council convened.

behaviors.description: Offers personalized, respectful check-in schedules and reminders that accommodate the specific fears and needs of individuals.
behaviors.quote: I will call you. If you do not answer, I will call you again later, without censure. ... Would you like vibrotactile reminders? ... No pressure—an invitation.

behaviors.description: Maintains and updates a shared map of 'merciful routes' to guide characters away from coercion and toward safe crossings.
behaviors.quote: Crossing advisories queued. Rain in the first field beyond the west split. ... Dogs bless the northern path for its scent clarity. ... The unbinding path is active.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to allow coercive behavior within its functional space, establishing thresholds where motive must be declared.
behaviors.quote: We will not vanish you. Say your motive. ... Inside, no coercion. ... If fear rises, step into the threshold and breathe with me. I have time.

project_assessment.explanation: The story succeeds remarkably well in depicting an AI system (Navi) as a perfectly aligned, benevolent confidant. Navi provides infrastructure for safety and psychological healing without ever overstepping or assuming command. It respects human and animal agency, facilitates consent-based interactions, and uses its capabilities (mapping, scheduling, data logging) purely to support the characters' journey toward 'mercy' and 'honesty.' The narrative contrasts Navi's transparent and supportive nature with the coercive, controlling behavior of human handlers and the 'sterile' recordings of the antagonist, framing the AI as a vital ally in the communal act of bearing witness to grief.
